Class UsersController

  • java.lang.Object

 @RestController
public class UsersController
extends java.lang.Object

      • saveUpdate

        @RequestMapping(value="/user",
                method=POST)
public MessageResponse saveUpdate(@RequestBody
                                                                                                UserRequest newUser)
        Parameters:
        newUser - UserRequest object from JSON received in the request from frontend.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse with success/fail result of process.

      • listNodeTypes

        @RequestMapping(value="/users/list",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<UserRequest> listNodeTypes()
        Returns:
        List with UserRequest objects with rows found in cassandra in users table.

      • login

        @RequestMapping(value="/login",
                method=POST)
public UserRequest login(@RequestBody
                                                                                        UserRequest newUser)
        Parameters:
        newUser - UserRequest object with JSON (user, password) data from frontend
        Returns:
        UserRequest with full data found in cassandra DB with the user and password given in request.
